PROJECT DETAILS.description: Persönliches Projekt, Verwendung und Inspiration durch Projekt mit Kristina Reischl
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: techno, trance, nature

PROJECT DETAILS.Team: Benjamin Klowe, Tim Ullrich, Samule Dilger and Lisa Fresser
PROJECT DETAILS.description: Fixly will make your grocery shopping easier, faster and more comfortable! Just upload your shopping list and wait until somebody, who want's to earn some extra money, accept it. With just a few more clicks your supermarkt shopping is on the way without even entering a supermarket!
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: ui design, app concept, ux

PROJECT DETAILS.description: A website for information and marketing purposes of the products Fleur et Sekt + Fruit et Sekt.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: webdesign, webdevelopment

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Werbefilm für den Nationalpark Hohe Tauern der im Rahmen der Bachelorarbeit an der FH Joanneum entstanden ist
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: film, video, commercial

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Imagefilm für die Riebenbauer GmbH - Büro für erneuerbare Energie
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: film, video, commercial

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Filmreihe über die Nationalparks Österreich
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: film, video, commercial

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Goal of this group project is to get people to learn a new language – in our example chinese and the chinese characters – in a fun and social way while staying at home during lockdown through COVID-19.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: arduino, concept, film

PROJECT DETAILS.description: With VinylHub you will never miss a release again. The days of vinyl's dusty image are finally over. You can keep track of your vinyl collection and even mark the release dates of pre-announced albums, so you'll be reminded at the right time sand never miss a release again.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: app design, app development

PROJECT DETAILS.Team: Lukas Franz, Güney Güner, Lea Su Lin Habel, Marie Kunzmann, Julian Schwazer, Petra Vymazalova
PROJECT DETAILS.description: Corona Cleanser is a comical installation that tries to “cleanse” your body from the COVID-19-Virus with different light and sound effects. The joke and fun of this process is the main feature of this interactive installation.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: installation, interaction design

PROJECT DETAILS.Team: Mojca Drevenšek, Ana Fabjan, Marie Kunzmann, Karoline Meierhofer, Belén Merino, Julian Schwazer, Carina Steindl
PROJECT DETAILS.description: Creatopia is an AR-powered app that allows you to reimagine city places and share your own imaginations. The app connects city-center-transport-related challenges in our physical environment with the virtual reimaginations of a better world, a better city. With the aim for these utopias to become reality.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: gamification, concept, ar, app design, sustainability

PROJECT DETAILS.Team: Lukas Brunner, Paul Höfler, Piotr Kupiec, Qun Xin Lin, Karoline Meierhofer
PROJECT DETAILS.description: Guide the little mouse Jimmy through the museum and help him solve different puzzles and deal with fun NPCs and follow their story.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: game design, game development, pixel art, unity, puzzle, adventure

PROJECT DETAILS.University: LUCA School of Arts (Brussels, Belgium) + Master Studio Project
PROJECT DETAILS.description: Design concept: logos and print material for an exhibition about black holes and the information paradox in Leuven, Belgium
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: logo design, branding, print design, infografics

PROJECT DETAILS.University: LUCA School of Arts (Brussels, Belgium) + Common Grounds
PROJECT DETAILS.description: Interactive survey to create an artpiece just with opinions and mindsets. Visitors got colored stickers according to their age and were asked to place them on the canvases to answer.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: interactive survey, interaction design, exhibition design

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Branding and Corporate Idenitity Concept for 'fud', a food truck, selling meals using only regional and seasonal ingredients.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: corporate identity, web design, app design, interface design

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Interactive survey to create an artpiece with opinions and mindsets. Visitors got colored stickers according to their age and were asked to place them on the canvases to answer. Moving Brands—Motion Design as an element of Corporate Identity is a publication on the relevance of Motion Design in Brand Design.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: brand design, book design, editorial design, digital arts

PROJECT DETAILS.description: /*Fun with*/ Processing is an ongoing self-initiated project dealing with creative coding respective generative art. The experimental, geometric artworks get created by an individual self-coded program via processing. The goal is to expand the written program and the level of interaction with a focus on aesthetically pleasing results.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: graphic design, processing, generative art, digital arts, poster

PROJECT DETAILS.description:
The Print & Production Calendar features international holidays as well as a daily dose of selected learnings regarding print and production.
Included are four categories: "general", "printing technology", "paper & binding" and "finishing".
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: conception, graphic design, editorial design, print, brand identity

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Besides the representation of works, the package including two booklets and a silkscreen poster was meant to explore the possibilities concerning printing techniques, functional packaging and also the choice of papers and colors while considering various ways of production.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: graphic design, packaging, illustration, letterpress, screen print, risography

PROJECT DETAILS.description: The poster edition combines linocut with handset lettering. Inspired by David Sax’ “The Revenge Of Analog”, the project should rise awareness for our direct environment and how it stimulates all of our human senses.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: poster design, linocut, manual typesetting, letterpress

PROJECT DETAILS.Team: Lisa Fresser, Tina Schart, Janina Schindler, Nicolas Saavedra, Katsiarnya Palishchuk
PROJECT DETAILS.description: Hiking Pass is a gamified app that tells the traditional story of the mountain via an Augmented Reality character. During the hike up you have to scan the stickers on the trail signs to unlock characters and objects that complete the story of the mountain.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: game design, game development, augmented reality, app design, interaction design, ar app

PROJECT DETAILS.description: The Geoportal OCP Ecuador is a custom software for monitoring the pipeline for the transportation of crude oil in Ecuadorian territory. The design and incorporation of the geoportal was done following UX protocols. The main objective of the system is that it can be used by administrative and technical personal.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: ux/ui, app design, software development, web design, corporate identity

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Relaxo is an application that plays songs with the purpose of relaxation. It combines different interactions methods so the user can use the application without the need to touch the screen.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: app design, app development, interaction design, sound,branding

PROJECT DETAILS.description: In these isolated times, the aim was to create a simple connection between two parts while they are having a meal apart. When one of the partners sits on their chair the other’s light starts glowing and same goes vice versa. This way both can feel connected without intrusion.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: interaction design, experience design, product design, arduino, communication

PROJECT DETAILS.description: All your smart health devices combined in an app that can help you gain new healthy habits, track your mood and get insights on your data.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: ux/ui, app design, health, iot, wellbeing

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Brand film for one of Austria's best vineyards.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: film, video, commercial

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Music video for up-and-coming rapper Shherl.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: film, video, commercial

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Short skate film about a brand new skate deck.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: film, video, commercial

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Packaging Design for Travel Beauty Set
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: travel, packaging, beauty

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Packaging Design for Vinegar Set
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: packaging, eat, vinegar,

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Bachelor Thesis, Game to promote the media skills of children and young people
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: media skills, analoge, game, children, teenager

PROJECT DETAILS.description: This research should answer the following question: How do different fonts influence the meaning of words?
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: user research, typography

PROJECT DETAILS.description: The target of this bachelor thesis was to create a manual about user experience design. This manual briefly explains important terms, methods and processes of UX design.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: user research, user experience design

PROJECT DETAILS.description: The aim of this course was to create a “new form of digital book ”. In cooperation with init_cd (an Experts Cluster from designaustria) it was possible to create a digital book about corporate design.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: app design

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Bachelor Film/  A marine scientist is showing her connection to the ocean and her ways to conserve it.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: documentary film, ocean conservation, diving, surf

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Waves and Ice is a short film with an all female crew and protagonists, it shows women in mostly man dominated sports fields and hopes to inspire other women to follow their passions.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: documentary film, snowboarding, diving, surf, outdoor, trailer

PROJECT DETAILS.Team: Lena Geiregger, Alex Moser, Lukas Franz, Niklas Dostal, Sonja Zechner, Corinna Kornherr, Viktoria Sorko
PROJECT DETAILS.description:
Forgetting Faces is a fun and engaging card game to train your memory. It is inspired by prosopagnosia
and aims to destigmatize the disorder while giving players the opportunity to empathize with
patients.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: game design, card game, game development, graphic design

PROJECT DETAILS.description: House of Print is a set of playing cards for everyone who loves print. On each of the 52 cards you can find a unique illustration which features essential facts and knowledge covering everything from printing techniques over different colors to facts about paper.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: game design, card game, game development, graphic design, print production, illustration

PROJECT DETAILS.description: An editorial design concept for the Shoshin magazine with three different cover variants.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: editorial design, illustration, graphic design, typography

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Panorama is a service for climate control. It consists of modular climate panels as well as an AR-App through which rooms can easily be scanned, adapting it to individual needs. Panorama was designed to provide a solution for urban people who desire to independently climatize their residencies sustainably.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: ux design, service design, industrial design, smart home

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Concept, production and implementation of an adaptive sound design and soundtrack for the sample game 'The Explorer' in Unity.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: game sound, adaptive sound design

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Sound design, music production and binaural mix for an abstract video.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: binaural sound design, music

PROJECT DETAILS.description: A progressive rock song from my solo project 'Drowning Dream'.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: music, production, progressive rock

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Madillo is a helmet that individually reacts to your head, and adapts its size. The innovative technology is based on auxetic technology, which is flexible, yet resilient. For your safety, lights emphasize your actions. In an emergency Madillo senses the accident, pulsates in a red light and calls the ambulance.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: industrial design, user experience design, transportation, mobility

PROJECT DETAILS.University: University of Applied Sciences Upper Austria (FH Hagenberg)
PROJECT DETAILS.description: A 2D casual game with a similar feel as curve fever. Each player has two keys to control the direction in which the dog is running. The goal is to lure as much sheep into the own gate as possible. Can be played with 2-6 players, the more players, the more fun.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: game design, game development, music production, sound design, 2d game, audio programming

PROJECT DETAILS.Team: Jan Adams, Leonora Bunjaku, Yasaman Eskandari, Güney Güner, Carolin Gruber, Eva Jobst, Johannes Köbl, Janina Schindler, Tina Schart, Viktoria Sorg, Guiseppe Taormina, Katrin Weissler
PROJECT DETAILS.description: The interactive mural was presented in a garage at the Urban Art Festival Styria. It represents the diversity and different perspectives of existence. Through a laser sensor that controls the mural with the help of the visitor, the multidimensional installation invites to interact with projection, light and sound.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: interactive installation, mural, typography, digital art, audio

PROJECT DETAILS.University: EXXETA AG, Quartier Zukunft & Hochschule Karlsruhe
PROJECT DETAILS.description: giventake is a web application which enables user to search and filter for specific secondhand stores in Karlsruhe, Germany.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: sustainablity, second hand, web development, ui/ux design, interaction design

PROJECT DETAILS.University: Hapag Lloyd, Impuls Design, Intermediate Engineering & GEOMAR
PROJECT DETAILS.description: The interactive applications ‘earth in motion’ and ‘journey to the deep sea’ are running on three cruise ships of Hapag Lloyd and are currently traveling around the globe. The applications enable passengers to learn about the movement of the plate tectonics and the structure of the ocean’s layers.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: information design, science, education, ui/ux design, interaction design,

PROJECT DETAILS.Team: Eva Jobst, Yasaman Eskandari, Carolin Helga Gruber, Janina Schindler, Marie Kunzmann & Lea Su-Lin Habel
PROJECT DETAILS.description: Different illusions break apart the structure of the facade projected on. The animations and film scenes were made for the Klanglicht Festival 2021 which unfortunately could only take place in smaller scale. A model was built to mimic the campus facade.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: projection mapping, video production, 3d, experimental, digital art, optical illusion

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Café Demut is a PopUp installation located in an abandoned hotel in the alpine village Bad Gastein. To bring new life to the hotel, the dining room hosts a temporary construction where stories of golden times are told and coffee is served.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: revitalisation, interiordesign, branddesign, abandoned

PROJECT DETAILS.description: A Brick, A Poster - A postmodern poster-series
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: poster design, photography, communication design

PROJECT DETAILS.Team: Jan Adams, Isabel Witting, Sonja Zechner
PROJECT DETAILS.description: Various visualisations are developed that symbolise the Corona pandemic. These are distorted by immersive sound and made partially unrecognisable. Through this audio-visual composition, the listeners and viewers should be sensitised to mental health and its relevance, especially during the Corona pandemic.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: immersive, sound design, experimental, creative coding, processing

PROJECT DETAILS.Project: Urban Art Festival Styria Poster Design
PROJECT DETAILS.description: Urban Art Festival Poster Design Proposal
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: poster design, communication design, conception

PROJECT DETAILS.description: A cluster organization does important work for the regional economy. Nevertheless, the organization is only as strong as its network, which consists of regional companies. The Silicon Alps Annual Report 2020 shows the many activities and valuable work of the organization together with the companies.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: editorial design, print

PROJECT DETAILS.description: The idea of the short film "Graz du bist so wunderbar" was to capture impressions of a city from an atypical perspective and to reproduce them in an unusual way that allows the recipient to reflect on his or her own perception of the city.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: shortfilm

PROJECT DETAILS.description: I created animated textures for this little private project and combined them with photos and typography, which led to these trippy space style illusions.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: animation, media design, after effects

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Animated Shortfilm about a popular video game called "Five Nights at Freddy's: Security Breach"
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: animation, 3d, blender

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Website for the Urban Art Festival Styria 2021
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: webdesign, screendesign, user interface design

PROJECT DETAILS.description: This app is intended to give women a feeling of security when they walk alone at night. To scare off attackers or harassers an alarm can be triggered either by shouting or by tapping the device. The activation of the flashlight should also draw attention to what is happening.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: appdesign, prototype, safety, ui/ux

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Postmodern poster series for the online exhibition "Beyond Objects"
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: posterdesign, photography, concept

PROJECT DETAILS.description: An interactive augmented-reality-guide for the Computermuseum in Kiel. In this prototype you can meet the energetic robot Z03 (called Zoe), that plays games with you with information from the physical objects in the cultural heritage.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: augmented reality, ar, interactive storytelling, cultural heritage, culture, hololens, unity

PROJECT DETAILS.description: A combination of the classic board game with immersive virtual reality. This high-fidelity prototype can be played with 2 players, that experience a full-fledged 2 hour story of a crime scene in Kiel. The game has additional features, such as a chat with your boss and some clues.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: interactive storytelling, virtual reality, vr, game design, board game, 360° video, unity

PROJECT DETAILS.description: An interactive  rhythm experience for the full-dome "Mediendom" in Kiel. With up to 4 players you can go on a star-escape-mission to two different planets. Every asset of the game, such as the soundtrack, was self composed / created by the team.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: music, rhythm, game design, full-dome, 360°, interactive programming, javascript

PROJECT DETAILS.description: 3D Model of a stylized girl completely done in Blender
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: blender, 3d modeling, 3d sculpting, 3d character, character design

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Digital illustration - color and light study
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: digital illustration, digital art, art study,

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Vertify's medical software VertifyMed enables early and simple clarification of patients with vertigo symptoms via a smart device. The prototype visualizes the click path and gives an overview about the questionaire, eye movement tests and the look and feel of the Corporate Identity.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: app design, interface design, user experience, usability

PROJECT DETAILS.description: This project was created during my part time employment at Gehmacher, a furniture, fashion outdoor department store and café in Salzburg. Due to the strong expansion, it became necessary to revise the website and map the new stores. In cooperation with the agency Endlosweit, the site was implemented under my guidance and according to my design specifications.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: interface design, website design, ui/ux, website architecture

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Musicvideo for Josef Paul by Eigengrau Media Crew
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: artdirection, setdesign

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Musicvideo for Die roten Knaben
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: artdirection, setdesign

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Commercial for Diezano
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: artdirection, setdesign

PROJECT DETAILS.description: With this project I participated in the “36 days of type” challenge 2020. For 36 days in a row I illustrated letters and numbers with an experimental approach, creating my own crazy typeface.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: illustration, typography, type design, digital art, digital illustration

PROJECT DETAILS.description: A sunny collection of connected illustrations based on the same color scheme. It started as a way to challenge myself, but continued to be a way to experiment and find my way.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: illustration, digital art, art, digital illustration

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Every year around Christmas my mum tells the family, “I won’t bake any cookies this year!” But on the 22nd of the Dezember she always decides to bake nevertheless. I wanted to document the massive amount of work my mum puts into these cookies and how long they last.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: illustration, digital art, infographic, information design

PROJECT DETAILS.description: KUMO is an art, design and travel magazine based on the idea of rediscovering our environment by abstracting it into vertical meters. KUMO is a bilingual magazine, so it offers English as the main language as well as a German translation in the same magazine.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: magazine, editorial, book, photography, ux design, webdesign, communication design, print

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Binaural composition made to sonificate this experimental video.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: binaural, audio/video, sound, design, abstract, experimental

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Sound Design for commercial jingle for football team.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: sound design, football, commercial, television

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Police Camouflage Short Werbung | Ich besitze nicht die Rechte der Bilder / des Videos und habe eine neue Tonebene (Musik & Sound) erstellt.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: composition, mixing, mastering

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Yves Saint Laurent - Parisienne - Werbung | Ich besitze nicht die Rechte der Bilder / des Videos und habe eine neue Tonebene (Musik & Sound) erstellt.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: composition, mixing, mastering

PROJECT DETAILS.description: New Monster.co.uk TV Werbung| Ich besitze nicht die Rechte der Bilder / des Videos und habe eine neue Tonebene (Musik & Sound) erstellt.

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Progressive Breaks track released on Emergent Textures in 2021
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: sound design, music production, composition, mixing, mastering

PROJECT DETAILS.description: 2D Designs for posters, flyers, business cards etc of fictional companies rendered in 3D space
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: 3d design, 2d design

PROJECT DETAILS.description: In this project old videos were reused; in fact this particular video was originally an instruction manual. With experimental sounds it was turned into something abstract and new.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: sound design, abstract, experimental

PROJECT DETAILS.description: An audio-visual installation/performance, that blends the analogue and digital world. Dealing with the topic of water and it’s accessibility. Worldwide, but also locally.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: digital, analogue, installation, performance, sound design, illustration

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Ideation and painting with mixed medias.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: minimal, abstract, visual art, ideation

PROJECT DETAILS.description: Homa is like "Tinder" but for helping people find future accommodation. In addition, it is intended to make communication for landlords easier because only the owner can choose with whom he wants to communicate. This project included UI design and mobile app development with Ionic Framework.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: interface design, app design, app development

PROJECT DETAILS.Team: Špela Bricman, Ebba Bergström, Alicia Martinez Lopez
PROJECT DETAILS.description: With this 3D game, we want to raise awareness of how we are treating our planet. The objective of this game is to not destroy the earth by simply making environmental-friendly decisions and avoiding flying pollutants. As an interaction device, we used a smartphone and ZIG SIM app.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: game design, game development, interface design, interaction design

PROJECT DETAILS.Team: Karoline Meierhofer, Carolin Gruber, Eva Jobst, Yasaman Eskandari, Anna Saluzu, Ana Belen
PROJECT DETAILS.description: This music video is about the bitterself that each person has in her/himself. The protagonist is a woman who deals with different thoughts in her daily life. At the end, she recognizes that all of these thoughts are rooted in her bitterself.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: video, music video, typography, motion graphics, music, set design, color

PROJECT DETAILS.Team: Thum Maximilian, Jan Cmiel, Andreas Voinea
PROJECT DETAILS.description: Toyota set up a photoshooting of all the exisitings genereations of their Toyota Supra, including it's predecessor, the Toyota 2000 GT, from 1967.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: photography, retouching

PROJECT DETAILS.description: A single taken from my EP titled "CMYK" done for my Project Work at FH Joanneum. It was about whether I could train everyone to have similar synesthetic experiences while listening to music.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: sound design, composition, mixing, mastering, video editing

PROJECT DETAILS.description: A short motion design animation, to test varoious effect and their impact.
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: motion design, animation

PROJECT DETAILS.Team: Esma Kurbegovic, Bibi Erjavec, Luka Grizeldi
PROJECT DETAILS.description: An ADHD themed puzzle game with medieval manuscript aesthetics. Created for the Gaming Gets Serious game jam, where we had to create a game with a socially engaged message, with the theme being "forgetting".
PROJECT DETAILS.Keywords: serious game jam
